fields.name: DayOfMonth
fields.description: UTC day on which cost analysis data will be emailed. Must be between 1 and 31. This property is applicable when frequency is Monthly and overrides weeksOfMonth or daysOfWeek.

fields.name: DaysOfWeek
fields.description: Day names in english on which cost analysis data will be emailed. This property is applicable when frequency is Weekly or Monthly.

fields.name: EndDate
fields.description: The end date and time of the scheduled action (UTC).

fields.name: HourOfDay
fields.description: UTC time at which cost analysis data will be emailed.

fields.name: StartDate
fields.description: The start date and time of the scheduled action (UTC).

fields.name: WeeksOfMonth
fields.description: Weeks in which cost analysis data will be emailed. This property is applicable when frequency is Monthly and used in combination with daysOfWeek.
